inputsClass.name: options
inputsClass.rawdescription:
This is an array of available options, each one of them will be rendered as a radio button item.
It is a list of options, of which each has the following fields:

outputsClass.rawdescription: Emits when the selected value has changed

components.description: OptionList is a form field that offers multiple exclusive options. The component is rather large and mostly used for type selection in multi step wizards, though it can also be used in a larger form as an alternative to plain radio buttons.
components.rawdescription:
OptionList is a form field that offers multiple exclusive options. The component is rather large and mostly used
for type selection in multi step wizards, though it can also be used in a larger form as an alternative to plain radio buttons.
